name: DOCS_RCVD_EPSD_PROVS_CMPL
description: The compiled list of providers for an external episode.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EPSD_PROV_KEY_CMPL
columns.description: Key value to link the provider to the episode. This points to the episode identifier (I DXR 28510).This data is from the most recent contact in I DXR 8600.
